stores.name: Blessings Abound
stores.about: Blessings  Abound Thrift Store is a Christian not for profit organization called  to serve the metro Kansas City Community by selling and recycling donated merchandise in order to provide aid to people in need.

stores.name: Ditto Overland Park
stores.about: Ditto is a recycled fashion retailer that buys and sells name-brand and designer clothing and accessories in the Kansas City and surrounding areas. We specialize in high-quality, name-brand resale fashion for trendy women, men, teens, plus sizes and maternity at a fraction of original retail prices. Ditto promotes the passion for fashion, encourages environmental awareness and shares the love of bargains.

stores.name: Savers
stores.about: Thrift store chain offering secondhand clothing, footwear, furniture, books & household items.
